pr_title: Add a property to set the s3 endpoint

timeline.message: Add a property to set the s3 endpoint

timeline.bodyText: Just curious, does MinIO take region/awsCredentialProvider as parameters?
timeline.author: xiangfu0

replies.bodyText:
I don't think MinIO cares about region.  It doesn't in the other code I'm using.
MinIO can be set up with a couple auth types.  I use accessKey and secretKey with MinIO locally.
replies.author: danbosnichill

replies.bodyText: It might make sense then to make region optional.  I wasn't able to test this locally (given I can't build Pinot).  I think keeping it required is a safer diff.
replies.author: danbosnichill

replies.bodyText: I think your code to not touch this should be ok, we can clean this up later.
replies.author: xiangfu0
